thread.section_title: skatedeluxe Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von skatedeluxe | www.skatedeluxe.com | 20 von 75
thread.title: Žilvinas

author: Žilvinas
title: Žilvinas
text: I originate from country that sk8deluxe doesn't deal with that often (eastern Europe (UN changed it into Northern just recently), their team cared enough to give me a call just minutes after I placed my order just to clarify the details where exactly do I live and how to find me. Needless to say, the package has been delivered within 2 business days and I have quality shoes I always wanted. I would (and already did) recommend this e-shop to everyone I know. Too bad the cap for free shipping is 100 euros, there are lots of stuff I'd like to order without spending too much.
